topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Resize an Instance

body.p: Users can make an instance larger or smaller as needed.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances link.
In the Instances screen, for the instance you want to modify, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Resize Instance.
In the Resize Instance screen, select a different flavor from the New Flavor list.
Refer to the Flavor Details list for information on the selected falvor.
The Total RAM meter under Project Limits will show how the resized instance affects the RAM allocated for the project.
